item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国央行决议前英镑跌至 1.34 美元
战争和食品价格可能让鲍威尔的夏天变得更热
item.description:
不确定性使美联储有理由暂停降息。这里还有几个理由。【原文：

Uncertainty has given the Fed reasons to pause rate cuts. Here are a couple of more.

】

item.title: 瑞士联合银行称瑞士改革对瑞银资本的推动是可行的
item.description: 瑞士国家银行（Swiss National Bank）表示，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）应该能够满足瑞士政府最近提出的改革建议所产生的任何新的资本要求，而无需动用股东的资金或过度削减投资者的派息。【原文：UBS Group AG should be able to meet any new capital requirements arising from the Swiss government’s recent reform proposals without tapping shareholders or unduly curtailing investor payouts, according to the Swiss National Bank.】

item.title: 日本拟从 7 月起削减超长期债券发行量
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份修订债券发行计划草案，日本财务省正在考虑从 7 月份开始减少超长期债券的发行量。【原文：Japan’s finance ministry is considering trimming its issuance of super-long bonds starting in July, according to a draft of a revised bond issuance plan seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 马来西亚安瓦尔称与美国的贸易谈判 "非常出色
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，马来西亚与美国就降低对东南亚国家关税的谈判进展顺利。【原文：Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said that Malaysia’s negotiations with the US to lower its tariffs on the Southeast Asian nation have been going well.】

item.title: 政治动荡导致泰国股指创五年新低
item.description: 泰国股票基准指数周四下跌，创下自 2020 年 3 月以来的最低收盘水平，此前政府第二大党退出了执政联盟，使总理钦那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）面临更大压力。【原文：Thailand’s equity benchmark index fell Thursday, heading toward its lowest closing level since March 2020 after the government’s second-largest party quit the ruling coalition, piling further pressure on Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra.】

item.title: 汽车关税将使每辆汽车价格上涨近 2000 美元
item.description: 据咨询公司 AlixPartners 称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收 300 亿美元关税的成本将首当其冲由汽车买家承担，这将使本已居高不下的美国汽车价格每辆上涨近 2000 美元。【原文：Car buyers will bear the brunt of the $30 billion cost of President Donald Trump’s tariffs, driving up already high US auto prices by almost $2,000 per vehicle, according to consultant AlixPartners.】

item.title: 即使逆转也未必能让超级富豪回心转意
item.description:
保守党留下的预算危机和工党开出的政策药方让所谓的 "无国籍人士 "向英国说再见。【原文：

The budget crisis left by the Tories and Labour’s policy prescriptions have so-called non-doms saying goodbye to Britain.

】

item.title: 意大利银行交易因投资者和罗马的反对而陷入困境
item.description: 近一年来，意大利一直是欧洲银行收购复兴的中心，至少有六七宗交易被提出。迄今为止，大多数交易都受困于政治反对和投资者利益之争。【原文：For almost a year now, Italy has been at the center of a renaissance in European bank takeovers, with at least half a dozen deals proposed. So far, most are stuck in political opposition and competing investor interests.】

item.title: 马来西亚就内容问题起诉 Telegram 频道
item.description: 马来西亚通信监管机构对两个 Telegram 频道提起民事诉讼，认为其内容有害。【原文：Malaysia’s communications regulator has filed a civil suit against two Telegram channels over content that it deemed harmful.】

item.title: Uber 警告香港司机和乘客可能受到新限制
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）正在向香港用户发送电子邮件，对香港正在制定的规则表示担忧，并警告说政府可能会对平台上允许的司机或车辆数量设置上限。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is emailing Hong Kong users to raise concerns about rules the city is formulating, warning the government could cap the number of drivers or vehicles allowed on the platform.】

item.title: 亚洲货币疲软，越南盾跌至历史新低
item.description: 越南盾下跌，跌破了 4 月份触及的历史低点，原因是有报道称美国正准备对伊朗实施可能的打击，导致亚洲货币下跌。【原文：The Vietnamese dong fell, dropping below a record low it touched in April, as Asian currencies declined following a report the US is preparing for a possible strike on Iran.】

item.title: 铂金在市场紧张的情况下反弹至2014年以来最高点
item.description: 铂金延续了强劲的涨势，创下十多年来的最高水平，需求激增和对市场赤字的预期支撑了铂金的涨势。【原文：Platinum extended a powerful rally to hit the highest level in more than a decade, with gains underpinned by a spike in demand and expectations for a market deficit.】

item.title: 在退市潮中，日本企业退出东京证券交易所的速度创下新高
item.description: 日本公司离开东京证券交易所的速度是十多年来最快的，这反映出日本公司在面临更好地利用资本的更大压力时，交易和管理层收购激增。【原文：Japanese companies are leaving the Tokyo Stock Exchange at the fastest pace in over a decade, reflecting a surge in deals and management buyouts as they face more pressure to make better use of their capital.】

item.title: 据说 LG 电子考虑恢复印度业务的首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，LG 电子公司正在考虑最快于 9 月份恢复其印度业务部门的首次公开募股。【原文：LG Electronics Inc. is considering reviving an initial public offering of its Indian unit as soon as September, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国经济增长担忧缓解，印度 IT 股成投资者首选
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 壳牌首席执行官表示，壳牌对伊朗周边航运 "非常谨慎
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）是最大的石油和天然气贸易商之一，该公司首席执行官表示，由于以色列和伊朗之间的冲突，该公司在中东的航运方面 "非常谨慎"。【原文：Shell Plc, one of the biggest traders of oil and natural gas, is “being very careful” with shipping in the Middle East due to the conflict between Israel and Iran, said the company’s chief executive officer.】

item.title: 特朗普的中国特使直言外国供应链的威胁
item.description: 美国驻华大使表示，美国希望通过将许多重要的供应链带回本土，重塑与中国乃至世界的贸易关系。【原文：The US wants to revamp its trading relationship with China and the world by bringing many critical supply chains back onshore, the American ambassador to Beijing said.】

item.title: 全球最赚钱的镍厂面临成本挑战
item.description: 印尼镍冶炼厂是世界上生产成本最低的镍冶炼厂之一，但由于一种关键原材料的价格暴涨，它们的盈利能力受到了打击，而此时市场正处于供应过剩的状态。【原文：A pioneering group of Indonesian nickel smelters with the world’s lowest production costs has been hit by a jump in the price of a key raw material, crimping their profitability just as the market is saddled with a glut.】

item.title: 解冻贷款让阿尔塞看到缓解玻利维亚严重危机的希望
item.description: 玻利维亚总统路易斯-阿尔塞计划在 11 月卸任前，利用国会批准的海外贷款来解决严重的燃料短缺和消费价格飙升问题。【原文：Bolivian President Luis Arce plans to use overseas loans green-lit by congress to tackle crippling fuel shortages and soaring consumer prices before he leaves office in November.】

item.title: 澳大利亚出人意料的就业岗位减少为降息提供了理由
item.description: 澳大利亚经济在 5 月份出人意料地减少了就业岗位，尽管由于求职人数减少，失业率保持稳定，这表明劳动力市场略有松动，并为储备银行进一步降低利率提供了支持。【原文：Australia’s economy surprisingly shed jobs in May, though unemployment held steady as fewer people sought work, suggesting a slight loosening of the labor market and bolstering the case for the Reserve Bank to reduce interest rates further.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴云将于 6 月在韩国启动第二个数据中心
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）将于 6 月底在韩国开设第二个数据中心，加速其在人工智能和云计算领域数十亿美元的押注。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. will open a second data center in South Korea by the end of June, accelerating its multibillion-dollar bet on artificial intelligence and cloud computing.】

item.title: 韩国美容帝国之争引发科尔玛控股股价第二天大涨
item.description: 受创始家族内部争斗的影响，科尔玛控股公司（Kolmar Holdings Co.【原文：Shares in Kolmar Holdings Co. surged as much as 26% on Thursday, extending the South Korean beauty conglomerate’s gains to a second day, driven by a feud within the founding family.】

item.title: 如果特朗普放弃奥库斯会怎样？
item.description:
在本周的澳大利亚播客中：丽贝卡-琼斯（Rebecca Jones）与记者本-韦斯特科特（Ben Westcott）讨论了五角大楼对《奥库斯条约》的审查可能产生的影响。【原文：

On this week’s Australia Podcast: Rebecca Jones talks to reporter Ben Westcott about the potential fallout from the Pentagon’s review of the Aukus pact.

item.title: 中国铜冶炼厂创历史纪录，国外竞争对手乏善可陈
item.description: 尽管冶炼厂收取的费用大幅下降，但中国上个月的铜产量仍保持在创纪录的水平，这给世界其他地方争夺原料的企业造成了巨大压力。【原文：Chinese copper production stayed at record levels last month, despite a plunge in the fees charged by smelters, piling the pressure on operations elsewhere in the world that compete for feedstock.】

item.title: Blackstone 的 ASK 计划在印度招聘 70 名财富银行家
item.description: 随着印度蓬勃发展的财富管理领域竞争的白热化，Blackstone Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s ASK Group plans to hire 70 private bankers as competition heats up within India’s booming wealth management space.】

item.title: QXO 提出以 50 亿美元收购建材公司 GMS
item.description: QXO 公司称已致函 GMS 公司，提议以约 50 亿美元的价格收购这家建筑产品分销商。【原文：QXO Inc. said it sent a letter to GMS Inc. proposing to buy the building products distributor for about $5 billion.】

item.title: 美联储通胀警告引发黄金下跌后黄金走高
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）警告美国经济面临通胀风险，引发黄金在前一交易日下跌后走高。【原文：Gold edged higher following a decline in the previous session triggered by Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell’s warning of inflation risks for the US economy.】

item.title: 韩国 Cuckoo 公司缩减首次公开募股规模后将在马来西亚首次亮相
item.description: 韩国家电制造商布谷鸟控股公司（Cuckoo Holdings Co.）【原文：A subsidiary of South Korean home-appliance maker Cuckoo Holdings Co. is set to go public in Malaysia after a scaled-down offering that’s expected to raise 395 million ringgit ($93 million).】

item.title: 马来西亚外汇储备创三年新高 有助林吉特保持稳定
item.description: 马来西亚不断增加的货币储备增强了其抵御市场波动的能力。【原文：Malaysia’s increasing currency reserves are bolstering its defenses against market volatility.】
